thread.section_title: US News, Breaking News and Headlines - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: New York-Area Students Join Nationwide Walkout, Some Risking Punishment

author: Leslie Brody
title: New York-Area Students Join Nationwide Walkout, Some Risking Punishment
text:
Students in New York City and its suburbs walked out of class Wednesday morning as part of nationwide protests a month after the school shooting in Parkland, Fla.
Shortly before 10 a.m. more than 1,000 of Stuyvesant High School students, according to school and police estimates, poured out of the school doors in lower Manhattan to rally at an athletic field nearby.
A... RELATED VIDEO 'This Day Matters to Us:' Parkland Students on the School Walkout Students from Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School in Florida spoke with The Wall Street Journal about the school walkouts nationwide.
